docs.snippet: With the pending $2 billion sale of the Los Angeles Clippers, it appears the discussion about racism in the N.B.A. and beyond has stopped....
docs.lead_paragraph: With the pending $2 billion sale of the Los Angeles Clippers, it appears the discussion about racism in the N.B.A. and beyond has stopped.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports Of The Times column laments that the pending sale of the Los Angeles Clippers seems to have prematurely silenced a national discussion about racism in the NBA and beyond.

headline.main: Clippers’ Sale Silences a Dialogue on Race
headline.print_headline: Clippers’ Sale Silences a Dialogue on Race

docs.snippet: Tony Parker plans to play in Game 1 of the N.B.A. finals against the Miami Heat, Spurs Coach Gregg Popovich said Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tony Parker plans to play in Game 1 of the N.B.A. finals against the Miami Heat, Spurs Coach Gregg Popovich said Tuesday.
docs.abstract: San Antonio Spurs guard Tony Parker will play in Game 1 of the NBA finals against the Miami Heat; had missed second half of game against Oklahoma City Thunder due to aggravated left ankle injury.

headline.main: Parker Plans to Play in Game 1
headline.print_headline: Parker Plans to Play in Game 1

docs.snippet: A three-peat for LeBron James and the Miami Heat or a shot at redemption for Tim Duncan and the San Antonio Spurs? The sports columnist Harvey Araton on the finals encore....
docs.lead_paragraph: A three-peat for LeBron James and the Miami Heat or a shot at redemption for Tim Duncan and the San Antonio Spurs? The sports columnist Harvey Araton on the finals encore.

docs.snippet: KATZ--Lewis. Dan and Abbe Klores and the Board of Directors of the New Renaissance Basketball Association extend their deeply felt condolences to the family of our friend and mentor Lewis Katz. We have loved you, Drew and Melissa for many, many ye...
docs.lead_paragraph: KATZ--Lewis. Dan and Abbe Klores and the Board of Directors of the New Renaissance Basketball Association extend their deeply felt condolences to the family of our friend and mentor Lewis Katz. We have loved you, Drew and Melissa for many, many years. Lewis made us smile, laugh and think. His wisdom and generosity, his sense of giving, his understated support for the underdog made him unique.

docs.snippet: KATZ--Lewis. Dan and Abbe Klores and the Board of Directors of the New Renaissance Basketball Association extend their deeply felt condolences to the family of our friend and mentor Lewis Katz. We have loved you, Drew and Melissa for many, many ye...
docs.lead_paragraph: KATZ--Lewis. Dan and Abbe Klores and the Board of Directors of the New Renaissance Basketball Association extend their deeply felt condolences to the family of our friend and mentor Lewis Katz. We have loved you, Drew and Melissa for many, many years. Lewis made us smile, laugh and think. His wisdom and generosity, his sense of giving, his understated support for the underdog made him unique.

docs.snippet: The Rev. Al Sharpton and other civil rights leaders pressed for greater diversity in NBA front offices in a meeting with Commissioner Adam Silver on Wednesday amid discussions about racial issues raised by the ouster of Los Angeles Clippers owner ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Rev. Al Sharpton and other civil rights leaders pressed for greater diversity in NBA front offices in a meeting with Commissioner Adam Silver on Wednesday amid discussions about racial issues raised by the ouster of Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling.

headline.main: Civil Rights Leaders Press NBA on Diversity
headline.print_headline: Civil Rights Leaders Press NBA on Diversity

docs.snippet: LaQuan Nelson, 16, was shot near Classon Avenue in Clinton Hill, Brooklyn. No arrests had been made as of late Tuesday in connection with the shooting, the police said....
docs.lead_paragraph: LaQuan Nelson, 16, was shot near Classon Avenue in Clinton Hill, Brooklyn. No arrests had been made as of late Tuesday in connection with the shooting, the police said.
docs.abstract: LaQuan Nelson, 16, of Brooklyn is shot and killed near Classon Avenue in Clinton Hill; police say no arrests have been made.

headline.main: Shot Yards Away From Police Station, a Teenager Collapses and Dies
